name: Eel Lady Cat Contest
description:
My game entry for the GMC JAM 31, which had the following themes:

OVERCOME ALL ODDS
ADAPTATION
CHEMICAL REACTIONS

It is a puzzle game, developed in 10 days  taking about 2 hours a day  of development.

I wish I had time to include more puzzles but time ran short.

I hope you enjoy it! If you would like to see me doing more work on this project, let me know.

Other than that, you can find me on youtube and twitter:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjUT5k8man6zvIM6NXBxo_g

https://twitter.com/TinyGamesLab1

If you would like to see a video of game creation process, pelase subscribe to my channel to be notified when I post it!
